thread.title: Michigan State’s injured Eron Harris takes floor for final time in emotional Senior Day moment
thread.title_full: Michigan State’s injured Eron Harris takes floor for final time in emotional Senior Day moment

author: Sara Harris (sharris@sportingnews.com)
title: Michigan State’s injured Eron Harris takes floor for final time in emotional Senior Day moment
text:
Updated at 9:04 a.m. ET 
Updated at 9:04 a.m. ET 
Michigan State senior Eron Harris suffered a season-ending knee injury in the Spartans’ loss at Purdue last week. 
The injury may have ended his college career, but thanks to Tom Izzo, it didn't stop Harris from getting his Senior Day moment in East Lansing. 
During the closing seconds of Michigan State's 84-74 win over Wisconsin on Sunday, Izzo told Matt McQuaid to travel, allowing Harris to check in. 
What followed was an extremely touching moment for the senior: Eron Harris checking in on Senior Night despite season ending injury. Touching. pic.twitter.com/zYpZDy1Toa
